benchmark.tool: *tool to benchmark (name of tool-info module for BenchExec)*
benchmark.displayName: *human-readable name as description of this benchmark*
benchmark.timelimit: *optional CPU time limit, use unit 's', 'min', etc. (default: none)*
benchmark.walltimelimit: *optional wall-time limit, use unit 's', 'min', etc. (default: CPU time plus a few seconds)*
benchmark.hardtimelimit: *optional hard CPU time limit, use unit 's', 'min', etc. (tool will be forcefully killed, otherwise identical with timelimit)
benchmark.memlimit: *optional memory limit, use unit 'B', 'kB', 'MB' etc. (default: none)*

tasks.name: *optional name for this subset of tasks*
tasks.includesfile: *file-name pattern for include files (text files with a pattern on each line)*
tasks.exclude: *file-name pattern for exclusion from input files*
tasks.excludesfile: *file-name pattern for exclude files (text files with a pattern on each line)*

columns.column: *pattern for extract data for this column from tool output*
